name: Enigma Labs
description:
You are a retired soldier hired as part of a private security force in a secret facility apart of the Enigma Energy Corporation. This is a game of choices, the choices you make affect the outcome of the story. Make bad decisions? There will be consequences. Make good decisions? Anything can happen. 

NOTICE: What you see is not a full-representation of what the final game will be like, many things will be added.

The game is still being made, it's a text based action RPG game. Meaning you click on a choice to advance the story. Deployment date TBD.
